channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 6 reasons to upgrade your Chase Sapphire Preferred to the Sapphire Reserve
item.description: There are six key reasons the Chase Sapphire Reserve is superior to the Chase Sapphire Preferred for frequent travelers.

item.title: Why the best point redemptions are sometimes the most practical
item.description: The best point redemptions aren't always flashy. Learn how practical uses of points can save time, reduce stress and make travel easier.

item.title: Capital One Venture Rewards vs. Capital One Venture X: Worth the extra $300?
item.description: We compare the long-standing crowd favorite, the Capital One Venture Rewards card, to its flashier sibling, the Capital One Venture X.

item.title: Earn rewards with Chaseâ€™s Refer-A-Friend program
item.description: Chase card referral bonuses can be a great way to earn bonus rewards without making a purchase. Here's what to know about Chase Refer-A-Friend.

item.title: Everything you need to know about the EU's ETIAS 'visa' requirements coming in late 2026
item.description: The European Travel Information and Authorization System will launch in 2026. Here's what you need to know about the ETIAS "visa" ahead of a future tr...
